com.hazelcast.hotrestart

Class NoopInternalHotRestartService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.hotrestart.NoopInternalHotRestartService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InternalHotRestartService

    public class NoopInternalHotRestartService
extends Object
implements InternalHotRestartService
    Empty implementation of InternalHotRestartService to avoid null checks. This will provide default behaviour when hot restart is not available or not enabled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NoopInternalHotRestartService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusterHotRestartStatusDTO getCurrentClusterHotRestartStatus()
      Returns latest Hot Restart status as Management Center DTO.
      Set<String> getExcludedMemberUuids()
      Returns UUIDs of the members that have been excluded during the cluster start.
      void handleExcludedMemberUuids(Address sender, Set<String> excludedMemberUuids)
      Handles the UUID set of excluded members only if this member is also excluded, and triggers the member force start process.
      boolean isMemberExcluded(Address memberAddress, String memberUuid)
      Checks if the given member has been excluded during the cluster start or not.
      void notifyExcludedMember(Address memberAddress)
      Notifies the excluded member and triggers the member force start process.
      void resetHotRestartData()
      Resets local hot restart data and gets a new UUID, if the local node hasn't completed the start process and it is excluded in cluster start.
      boolean triggerForceStart()
      Forces node to start by skipping hot-restart completely and removing all hot-restart data even if node is still on validation phase or loading hot-restart data.
      boolean triggerPartialStart()
      Triggers partial start if the cluster cannot be started with full recovery and HotRestartPersistenceConfig.clusterDataRecoveryPolicy is set accordingly.
      void waitPartitionReplicaSyncOnCluster(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Waits until partition replicas (primaries and backups) get in sync.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • triggerForceStart

        public boolean triggerForceStart()
        Description copied from interface: InternalHotRestartService
        Forces node to start by skipping hot-restart completely and removing all hot-restart data even if node is still on validation phase or loading hot-restart data.
        Specified by:
        triggerForceStart in interface InternalHotRestartService
        Returns:
        true if force start is triggered successfully. force start cannot be triggered if hot restart is disabled or the master is not known yet

      • triggerPartialStart

        public boolean triggerPartialStart()
        Description copied from interface: InternalHotRestartService
        Triggers partial start if the cluster cannot be started with full recovery and HotRestartPersistenceConfig.clusterDataRecoveryPolicy is set accordingly.
        Specified by:
        triggerPartialStart in interface InternalHotRestartService
        Returns:
        true if partial start is triggered.

      • isMemberExcluded

        public boolean isMemberExcluded(Address memberAddress,
                                String memberUuid)
        Description copied from interface: InternalHotRestartService
        Checks if the given member has been excluded during the cluster start or not. If returns true, it means that the given member is not allowed to join to the cluster.
        Specified by:
        isMemberExcluded in interface InternalHotRestartService
        Parameters:
        memberAddress - address of the member to check
        memberUuid - UUID of the member to check
        Returns:
        true if the member has been excluded on cluster start.

        public Set<String> getExcludedMemberUuids()
        Description copied from interface: InternalHotRestartService
        Returns UUIDs of the members that have been excluded during the cluster start.
        Specified by:
        getExcludedMemberUuids in interface InternalHotRestartService
        Returns:
        UUIDs of the members that have been excluded during the cluster start

      • notifyExcludedMember

        public void notifyExcludedMember(Address memberAddress)
        Description copied from interface: InternalHotRestartService
        Notifies the excluded member and triggers the member force start process.
        Specified by:
        notifyExcludedMember in interface InternalHotRestartService
        Parameters:
        memberAddress - address of the member to notify

      • handleExcludedMemberUuids

        public void handleExcludedMemberUuids(Address sender,
                                      Set<String> excludedMemberUuids)
        Description copied from interface: InternalHotRestartService
        Handles the UUID set of excluded members only if this member is also excluded, and triggers the member force start process.
        Specified by:
        handleExcludedMemberUuids in interface InternalHotRestartService
        Parameters:
        sender - the member that has sent the excluded members set
        excludedMemberUuids - UUIDs of the members that have been excluded during the cluster start

      • getCurrentClusterHotRestartStatus

        public ClusterHotRestartStatusDTO getCurrentClusterHotRestartStatus()
        Description copied from interface: InternalHotRestartService
        Returns latest Hot Restart status as Management Center DTO. An empty status object will be returned if Hot Restart is not available (not EE) or not enabled.
        Specified by:
        getCurrentClusterHotRestartStatus in interface InternalHotRestartService

      • resetHotRestartData

        public void resetHotRestartData()
        Description copied from interface: InternalHotRestartService
        Resets local hot restart data and gets a new UUID, if the local node hasn't completed the start process and it is excluded in cluster start.
        Specified by:
        resetHotRestartData in interface InternalHotRestartService

      • waitPartitionReplicaSyncOnCluster

                                              TimeUnit unit)
        Description copied from interface: InternalHotRestartService
        Waits until partition replicas (primaries and backups) get in sync.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        unit - time unit
